name: Empty: An eye experience (Anjin16)
description:
Empty is a psychological horror visual novel

dreamcore/weirdcore style based on different dreams I've had.

This novel is a critique of Christianity and should not be taken seriously.

This novel was developed in 3 weeks. This is my first project as a programmer and the first of many

I would really appreciate it if you could leave me a review telling me what you thought.

-Anjin
